  • Description

Description

Toka CBD-infused gummy bears come in three flavors and make ingesting CBD delicious and enjoyable. Each cherry, orange, or lemon gummy bear is infused with 25mg of CBD. Use our edibles for slow-relea, long-lasting effects.

Suggested Use: Take 1-2 gummies daily.

Store in a cool, dry, and dark location. Keep out of reach of children.
Made in the USA

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. No products produced, manufactured, marketed, or distributed are intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Consult your physician before beginning any supplements or botanical extracts. If pregnant or breast feeding, consult with your physician before use. For use by adults 18+. Keep out of reach of children.

100% ORGANIC INDUSTRIAL
HEMP GROWN
IN COLORADO
